roleset.name: control via law
roleset.note: LEGISLATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'legislate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison. (from legislate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usage
example.text: *trace* Legislating new trading inefficiencies will only make things harder on the least sophisticated investors.

example.name: usage
example.text: Promulgation of minimum wage laws for women in the states followed their legislation of maximum hours.
